title: Benefits of Correct Search
intro: You've seen how simple it is to search the Intranet. But what are the real benefits of this practice?
tip_text: Keep the Intranet always open in a browser tab during work hours. This saves you time on every call!

quiz.question: Mastering information queries on the Intranet contributes to:
quiz.feedback_wrong_a: Correct Intranet search REDUCES service time, by finding information quickly without asking colleagues.
quiz.feedback_wrong_b: The Intranet INCREASES standardization, as everyone consults the same official source, ensuring consistent answers.
quiz.opt_c: C) Ensuring agility, assertiveness and better customer experience.
quiz.feedback_wrong_d: Consulting official sources makes service more PROFESSIONAL, not informal. It shows preparedness and commitment.
quiz.feedback: Correct Answer! Happy customer is a customer served with agility and accuracy.
